message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your initial offer was a bit too generous towards yourself, Alice. I'm proposing a more balanced split. Let's not drag this out and lose value.
I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers. This is as low as I'm willing to go!
Alice, the clock is ticking and the value is decreasing.  I'm offering a deal very close to yours to settle this quickly. Let's be reasonable and end this.
